description.narrative: This activity (Systematic Review Pilot) is a component of Systematic Review Projects reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £2,283,887. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Educational research, Agricultural research, Research/scientific institutions. , with the following implementing partners: Harvard University, Innovations for Poverty Action, Institute of Development Studies, International Centre for Diarrhoeal Disease Research, International Initiative for Impact Evaluation, London School of Economics and Political Science, London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine, Natural Environment Research Council, Overseas Development Institute, School of International Development (UEA), University of Edinburgh, University of London, World Vision Australia. The start date is 11-03-2010 and the end date is 31-12-2014.

participating-org.narrative: International Centre for Diarrhoeal Disease Research
London School of Economics and Political Science
London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine
